# WEAPON::SET_PED_DROPS_WEAPONS_WHEN_DEAD

## Summary
Sets whether a character drops his weapons as pickups when he dies

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** dropsWeaponsFlag
